title: square geometric sans on Eckstein Cigaretten package
content:
I search already all day long.  
Can anyone help me? Need the exactly font …

thx in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [eckstein.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=eckstein.gif) | 23.77 KB |
author: Souste

comments.content: [Morgan Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128225225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/feliciano/morgan-big/morgan-bg1-bold/testdrive.html?s=ECKSTEIN+CIGARETTEN&p=36) would work, only the R is different.

In the case that I do not find the Font, this could be a possibility …

thx a lot
A little more off, but incredible fun to use — [Mayo](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128225225/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/mayo.asp) by [Peter Bruhn](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Peter%20Bruhn).

I don’t think you’ll ever find a digital font to match that exactly, but I know I’ve seen that K before. Will keep looking.

Meanwhile, also from Fountain is [Borgstrand](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128225225/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FT.118654.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=24&sampleText=ECKSTEIN+CIGaRETTEN&sampleSize=24&attributes.paraSize=14&paraSize=14). Heavier, but similar shapes.
